NAME: Buzzoid
DESC: A hideous bug like creature that smells of liquor and sewage.
DIALOG: It flaps its pathetic wings with great force!

NAME: Zappan
DESC: Ted isn't quite sure what to make of this round object that gargles at him.
DIALOG: It throws a dog-doo snow cone!
It rubs yellow snow in your eye!

NAME: Beefheart
DESC: A magical, funky beast native to the Jorlene sector.
DIALOG: It slams its fists into your gut!
